me yatathe sama gam karya sabhawathma podu depala thaba ganima podu mudrawath thaba ganima badu aya kirima saha wyawastha panawiya haki nithigatha sansthawak bawata path wima sidu wiya. 1946 anka 53 panatha magin methek gamsabha saha nagara sabha sandaha wu mathiwarana nithiya wenas kota siyaluma palath palana aayathana mathiwarana komasariswaraya yatata path karana ladi.esema 1945 anka 43 panatha magin siyaluma palath palana sewakayan palathpalana sewa komisama yatathata path kara atha. 1955 di rajaya wisin path karana lada choksi komisama magin palath palana aayathana wala swayan palana hakiyawa wimarshanaya kota yojana idiripath kara thibe.
